mapper.select: SELECT p.data,p.id,d.docFileTemplateId,pp.pname,pp.beginYear,pp.formula,pp.tecIndustry,d.finished,d.month, pp.rdIndex,t.docTemplateName as templateName,p.wordLength,d.docFileName,d.projectId,d.docFileId,d.stage FROM p_docFile d LEFT JOIN p_docFile_data p ON d.id = p.pdocFileId LEFT JOIN p_project pp ON d.projectId=pp.id LEFT JOIN docFileTemplate t ON t.id = d.docFileTemplateId LEFT JOIN docFile f ON f.id = d.docFileId LEFT JOIN docFileTemplate t2 ON t2.docFileId = f.id AND t2.defaultTemplate = TRUE WHERE d.id = #{pDocFileId}
select pd.* from p_docFile pd where pd.projectId=#{projectId} and docFileId=17 and !deleted order by `month`
select id,pdocFileId,`data` from p_docFile_data where pdocFileId in (#{docFileId})
select pd.docFileId,pdd.data,pd.month from p_docFile_data pdd inner join p_docFile pd on pd.id=pdd.pDocFileId where pd.projectId=#{projectId} and pd.docFileId in (#{dId})

select planYield,trialDate,rdYield from p_yield_config pyc inner join p_docFile pd on pd.projectId=pyc.projectId and pd.month = pyc.month where pd.projectId=#{projectId} and pd.docFileId=17 order by trialDate
select count(id) from p_docFile_attachment where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId}
select count(sd.id) from sys_document sd inner join sys_docList sdc on sd.listId=sdc.id and sdc.listType=1001 and sdc.docName !='查新报告' where sd.companyId=#{companyId} and sd.projectId=#{projectId}
select count(id) from patent where companyId=#{companyId} and projectId=#{projectId}
select count(sd.id) from sys_document sd inner join sys_docList sdc on sd.listId=sdc.id and sdc.listType=1001 and sdc.docName ='查新报告' where sd.companyId=#{companyId} and sd.projectId=#{projectId}
